examples.sentence: The box was decorated with delicate fillagreing.
examples.translation: その箱は繊細な透かし細工で装飾されていた。

etymology.value: "Fillagreing" is an older spelling of "filigree." The word "filigree" comes from the Italian word "filigrana", which is derived from the Latin words "filum" (thread) and "granum" (grain).

usage_notes.explanation: "Fillagreing" is an archaic spelling of "filigree". It is rarely used in modern English. Use "filigree" instead.

readability_explanation.text: This word is an archaic spelling of "filigree" and is rarely used in modern English. It is best to use the modern spelling, "filigree."
